text: jo log ye bahuth bada buhtaan baandh laaye hai, ye bhi tum mein se hee ek gruh hai, tum ise apne liye bura na samjho, balke ye to tumhaare haq mein behtar hai, haan un mein se har ek shaqs par, itna gunaah hai jitna us ne kamaaya hai aur un mein se jis ne us ke bahuth bade hisse ko sar anjaam diya hai, us ke liye azaab bhi bahuth hee bada hai
